title.rendered: Thrive Global reports: The most valuable asset in life is an open and flexible mind

excerpt.rendered: The most valuable asset in investing (and life!) is an open and flexible mind. Always be prepared to be proven wrong and be humble enough to challenge your views. An Interview with Alvarium’s Clara Bullrich.
